roleset.name: turn down, reject

example.name: transitive, no benefactive
example.text: Earlier this year, the Fed denied an application by Continental Bank Corp. to purchase Grand Canyon State Bank in Scottsdale, Ariz., on grounds that Continental hadn't fully complied with the Community Reinvestment Act.
example.arg: an application by Continental Bank Corp. to purchase Grand Canyon State Bank in Scottsdale, Ariz.,
on grounds that Continental hadn't fully complied with the Community Reinvestment Act.

example.name: deny an S
example.text: In affidavits filed yesterday in the Los Angeles court, Mr. Ross, Warner Bros. Chairman Robert Daly and President Semel deny that such an oral agreement was ever made.
example.arg: In affidavits filed yesterday in the Los Angeles court,
Mr. Ross, Warner Bros. Chairman Robert Daly and President Semel
that such an oral agreement was ever made.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: Lawmakers in Moscow voted to deny the Communist Party its 100 guaranteed seats in the Soviet Congress , meaning Gorbachev and other aides might have to face voters .
example.arg: its 100 guaranteed seats in the Soviet Congress

roleset.note: DENY-V NOTES: Member of VNcls conjecture-29.5-1. Comparison with 'approve'. (from deny.01-v)

roleset.name: able to be denied

example.name: arg1
example.text: Nagoya 's Mayor Shintaro Ishihara uttered total nonsense : " when the ' Nanjing Incident ' happened in 1937 , normal acts of war are not deniable , which is a pity , but the so - called ' Nanjing Incident ' could not have happened . "
example.arg: when the ' Nanjing Incident ' happened in 1937

roleset.note: DENIABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6, relation to deny.01. (from deniable.01-j)
